item.title: Freak Pleasures
item.description: Now this is protest art. Specifically, the protest of SESTA/FOSTA and the censorship it entails, not to mention the way it endangers those it purports to protect. Available here: https://claystorks.itch.io/freak-pleasures

item.title: Goddess
item.description: Chapbooks and zines are an art form, the ideal container for poetry. I wanted more of this one, which is the indication of a good chapbook indeed. ARC kindly provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review.
